oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: Certificate of promotion for Pvt. Wilson A. Dowdy to corporal
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: Pvt. Wilson A. Dowdy, then of Btry. F, 318th FA at Camp Jackson, S.C. was promoted to corporal and later sergeant. Dowdy, a farmer from Chapel Hill, Tennessee, later served in Btry. F, 318th FA, 81st Div. He was overseas in France from August 8, 1918 until June 11, 1919. Dowdy was promoted to corporal in February 1918 and to sergeant in October 1918.
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:subject: World War, 1914-1918; World War, 1914-1918 - History
